TestCaseMetaData.name: Positive Ack for M08
TestCaseMetaData.Description: Dr. Radon's practice EHR-S transmits an accept acknowledgement message to Century Hospital's LIS which indicates the first test compendium message (M08) has been successfully received.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: EDOS_0.0_1.1-M08_New_SmokeTest has been received by the EHR-S.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support a positive acknowledgement Message in response to receiving the M08 message. Demonstrate capability to support a single occurrence of all required ("R") elements in the MSH segment. Demonstrate capability to support a single occurrence of all required ("R") elements in the MSA segment. Demonstrate capability to support a single occurrence of all required ("R") elements in the MFI segment.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: This is the initial "smoke testing" to reveal simple failures of the acknowledgment message severe enough to preclude further testing.
